dct_title_s: The Literary Digest liberty map of the Western Front of the Great World War : showing the battle line of liberty as it stood May 1st, 1918, also showing the lines of farthest advance of the German and the French offensives with complete index
dct_description_sm: Insets: Map of the complete war area showing Russian, Italian, Balkan, Palestine and Mesopotamian campaigns; also the zones of submarine blockade -- The coal and iron fields in the western war territory -- Production of pig iron in metric tons [and] coal in short tons.
